name: Sol System
description:
This is a simple, orthographic, solar system simulation, project, for the Game Design & Development  specialization. 

Stellar Bodies & Improvements Overview :

  • Sun
  • Mercury
  • Venus
  • Earth & Moon ( rotates around Earth and its axis)
  • Mars
  • Jupiter
  • Neptune
  • Uranus
  • Pluto
  • Spawning Comets ( top, bottom , left & right)
  • Oumuamua
  • New improved Skybox
  • Instructions text
  • Planets rotate around the Sun and their axis
  • Mini-map with transparent background
  • Sounds
